short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flip the screen 180 degrees or return it back to normal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flip Screen 180 is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that allows you to rotate your browser window 180 degrees with just a click of a button. Whether you're looking for a fun way to prank your friends, or you need a unique perspective for web development, Flip Screen 180 has got you covered!

Features:

Instant Screen Flip: Flip your screen 180 degrees with a single click.
Toggle Functionality: Click again to return your screen to the normal view.
User-Friendly: Easy-to-use interface with a straightforward button in the popup menu.
Secure: Safeguards against flipping restricted URLs like chrome://, chrome-extension://, about:, and file://.
How to Use:

Install the extension.
Click the Flip Screen 180 icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Click the "Flip Screen 180" button in the popup to rotate the screen.
Click the button again to revert to the original view.
Use Cases:

Entertainment: Surprise your friends by flipping the screen on shared devices.
Web Development: Test how your web pages appear when viewed from an inverted perspective.
Accessibility: Assist users who need an inverted view for specific tasks.
Privacy Policy:
Flip Screen 180 respects your privacy and does not collect or store any personal data.

Enjoy a new way to interact with your web browser! Download Flip Screen 180 today and start flipping!
